mapper.select: select orderId, scheduleObj, rowsIndex, cols, price, userObj, orderTime from t_movieorder where orderId = #{orderid}
select orderId, scheduleObj, rowsIndex, cols, price, userObj, orderTime from t_movieorder limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT mo.orderId, mo.scheduleObj, mo.rowsIndex, mo.cols, mo.userObj, mo.status, mo.price, sc.scheduleTime, sc.scheduleDate, m.movieName, m.moviePhoto, mh.movieHallName FROM t_movieorder mo JOIN t_schedule sc ON mo.scheduleObj = sc.scheduleId JOIN t_moviehall mh ON sc.hallObj = mh.movieHallId JOIN t_movie m ON sc.movieObj = m.movieId WHERE mo.userObj = #{name} order by mo.orderTime desc

SELECT tm.movieId, tm.movieName, tm.price, ts.scheduleId, ts.scheduleTime, ts.scheduleDate, tmh.movieHallId, tmh.movieHallName, tmh.cols, tmh.rows, ts.seatRule FROM t_movie tm JOIN t_schedule ts ON tm.movieId = ts.movieObj JOIN t_moviehall tmh ON ts.hallObj = tmh.movieHallId WHERE movieId = #{id}
SELECT tmo.cols, tmo.rowsIndex, tmo.scheduleObj FROM t_movieorder tmo JOIN t_schedule ts ON tmo.scheduleObj = ts.scheduleId WHERE ts.movieObj = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_movieorder(scheduleObj, rowsIndex, cols, price, userObj, orderTime) values (#{scheduleobj}, #{rowsindex}, #{cols}, #{price}, #{userobj}, #{ordertime})
mapper.update:
update t_movieorder
scheduleObj = #{scheduleobj},
rowsIndex = #{rowsindex},
cols = #{cols},
price = #{price},
userObj = #{userobj},
orderTime = #{ordertime},
status=#{status}
where orderId = #{orderid}
mapper.select: select * from t_movieorder order by orderTime desc

select tu.user_name, tm.movieName, tmh.movieHallName, ts.scheduleDate, ts.scheduleTime, tmo.cols, tmo.rowsIndex, tmo.orderTime, tmo.price from t_schedule ts join t_moviehall tmh on ts.hallObj = tmh.movieHallId join t_movie tm on ts.movieObj = tm.movieId join t_movieorder tmo on tmo.scheduleObj = ts.scheduleId join t_userinfo tu on tmo.userObj = tu.user_name where tmo.orderId = #{id}

select tm.movieName, count(tmo.orderid) as count from t_schedule ts join t_moviehall tmh on ts.hallObj = tmh.movieHallId join t_movie tm on ts.movieObj = tm.movieId join t_movieorder tmo on tmo.scheduleObj = ts.scheduleId group by tm.movieid
